name: FitNesseConfigure
description: Configure FitNesse for FitSharp so it can be used to execute tests
author: Rik Essenius

inputs.name: targetFolder
inputs.label: Target Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Data folder for FitNesse, under which the wiki and fixture folders are created

inputs.name: port
inputs.label: Desired port
inputs.helpMarkDown: Desired port to run the FitNesse instance on

inputs.name: slimPoolSize
inputs.label: SLIM Pool Size
inputs.helpMarkDown: Pool size for SLIM server (starts from SLIM Port)

inputs.name: slimTimeout
inputs.label: SLIM Timeout
inputs.helpMarkDown: Timeout for the SLIM server in seconds.

inputs.name: unblockPorts
inputs.label: Unblock Ports
inputs.helpMarkDown: Open firewall to allow incoming traffic on the FitNesse/FitSharp ports
